犯不上.definition: see 犯不著|犯不着[fan4 bu5 zhao2]

犯事.definition: to break the law; to commit a crime

犯怵.definition: to be afraid; to feel nervous

犯戒.definition: to go against the rules (of a religious order); to break a ban (e.g. medical)

犯案.definition: to commit a crime or offense

犯渾.definition: confused; mixed up; muddled up; befuddled

犯罪.definition: to commit a crime; crime; offense

犯規.definition: to break the rules; an illegality; a foul

犯諱.definition: to use the tabooed name 名諱|名讳[ming2 hui4] of hierarchical superiors (old); to violate a taboo; to use a taboo word or character

犯錯.definition: to err; to make a mistake; to do the wrong thing
